      <script>
        function delAff(){localStorage.removeItem("affAw"),localStorage.removeItem("affID"),localStorage.removeItem("affQuery")}function affDAw(){let e=new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);(e.get("utm_source")||e.get("utm_medium")||e.get("utm_campaign"))&&!e.get("clickid")&&delAff();let f=localStorage.getItem("affAw");if(f){let t=new Date(f);new Date>=t&&delAff()}}affDAw();
      </script>

auto;text-align:left;width:90%;max-width:90%;}.bottom_description a{color:#b19975 !important;}.bottom_description a:hover{text-decoration:underline;}</style><div class="bottom_description"><p><strong>BUY WOMEN'S KURTAS ONLINE</strong></p><p>Get ready to be smitten with a whole lot of ethnic love with AJIO.com's sizeable and oh-so-stunning collection of kurtas for women. We have all the styles that your heart desires, from charismatic colours to pretty prints and fantastic fabrics, right here with us.</p><p>For every day wear, a cotton kurta is perfect. Keep the traditional vibe high by choosing a block-printed kurta and pair it with a <a href="../women-salwars-churidars/c/830303002?q=%3Arelevance%3Abrickstyletype%3AChuridar">classic churidar</a>. Want to add a dash of modern style to the look? Switch the churidar with a pair of <a href="../women-pants-shorts/c/830309002?q=%3Arelevance%3Abrickstyletype%3APalazzo">palazzos</a> and work the contemporary Indian look. For days that call for dressier looks, let gorgeous embroidered kurtas lead the way. Style them up with exquisite <a href="../women-clothing-accessories/c/830302?q=%3Arelevance%3Acurated%3Atrue%3Ahead%3ADupattas%2C+Stoles+%26+Scarves%3Abrandtype%3A5%3Abrickcatgtype%3A830303005%3Abrickcatgtype%3A830302003">accessories</a> and a pair of juttis and you have yourself an ethnic look that is effortlessly chic. When striving for a fun and playful vibe, keep the length of the kurta till the knees and opt for a long kurta when you want to keep it elegant. With a long, white kurta and golden dupatta and churidar, it's impossible to look anything but graceful and breathtakingly beautiful!</p><p>Whether you're looking to buy a women's kurta that is all out traditional, or a trendsetting new-age one, with AJIO, you'll find all that you're searching for. An anarkali kurta is a timeless style and one that is an essential piece of <a href="../Women%27s-Collection/Women/Ethnic-Wear/c/830303">ethnic wear</a> in any wardrobe. Keep it dramatic and draw all eyes to yourself by choosing one with a whole lot of flare or keep it subtle, yet eye-catching in a straighter, fitted one. Keeping up with the current crop of trends isn't too difficult either, when you have us around. Choose from our marvellous range of kurtas with chic high-low hems, eye-popping geometric prints and soothing pastel shades and other women's kurtas to keep your desi style, on point.</p><p>With AJIO, the process to buy women's kurtas online has become wonderfully easy and breezy. At the click of a button, you can access a stunning and carefully curated collection of women's kurtas from brands across the country. Keep it snazzy in classic Indian styles with <a href="../b/biba?q=%3Arelevance%3Abrickcatgtype%3A830303011">Biba kurtas</a> or ultra-chic and modern with <a href="../b/w?q=%3Arelevance%3Abrickcatgtype%3A830303011">W</a>'s delightful range of unique printed kurtas for women. <a href="../b/indie-picks?q=%3Arelevance%3Abrickcatgtype%3A830303011">Indie Picks</a> is going to leave you enchanted with their collection of warm and earthy toned kurtas, as well as some brightly coloured ones, while <a href="../b/bitterlime?q=%3Arelevance%3Abrickcatgtype%3A830303011">Bitterlime</a> and <a href="../b/jiyaa?q=%3Arelevance%3Abrickcatgtype%3A830303011">Jiyaa</a> will have you crushing over their classic ethnic prints. When it comes to variety, let <a href="../b/rangmanch-by-pantaloons?q=%3Arelevance%3Abrickcatgtype%3A830303011">Pantaloons</a>, <a href="../b/aurelia?q=%3Arelevance%3Abrickcatgtype%3A830303011">Aurelia</a> and our in-house brand <a href="../b/ajio?q=%3Arelevance%3Abrickcatgtype%3A830303011">AJIO</a> show you how it's done.</p><p>What are you waiting for? Go give your wardrobe the ultimate makeover with women's kurtas from our dream collection!</p></div></div></div></div><div class="seo-ftr-btm-brdr"></div></div><div class="   main-footer         <script>
        function loadFirebaseScript(filename, executePerf = false){
          var fileref=document.createElement('script')
          fileref.setAttribute("type","text/javascript")
          fileref.setAttribute("src", filename)
          if (typeof fileref!="undefined") {
            document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(fileref);
            fileref.onload = function() {
              !executePerf && loadFirebaseScript("https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/7.6.1/firebase-performance.js", true);
              if(executePerf){
                var firebaseConfig = firebaseConfig;
                  // Initialize Firebase
                  firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig);                
                  var perf = firebase.performance();
              }
            }
          }
        }
        loadFirebaseScript("https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/7.6.1/firebase-app.js");
      </script>

        <script>
          function setJioAdsConfiguration(){
            let envData = window.__ENV__ ? window.__ENV__ : 'prodGcp';
            console.log("envData:", envData);
            let reqType = "stg";
            if(envData === "prodGcp" || envData === "prodGcpReplica") {
              reqType = "prod";
            }
            console.log("reqType:", reqType)
            let av = "1.0.0";
            
            var conf = {
              appName: "AJIO",
              appId: window?.location?.host || "ajio.com",
              appSdkVer: "1.0",
              language: "en",
              country: "IN",
              logLevel: 1, //debug: 1, log: 2, info: 3, trace: 4, warn: 5, error: 6
              reqType: reqType, // prod or stg
              av,
              la: "",
              lo: ""
            }
            var { JioAds } = window;
            if (JioAds) {
              window['jioSDKInitializedStatus'] = "NOTDONE";
              JioAds.onInitialised = function(){
                console.log("sdk Initialised..........");
                window['jioSDKInitializedStatus'] = "DONE";
              }
              JioAds.setConfiguration(conf);
              JioAds.setEndPoint(reqType);
            }
          }
        </script>

    <script>
      if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        window.addEventListener('load', function() {
          var hashes = {};

          ["appCss", "appJs"].map(function(val,idx){
            let prop;
            if(document.getElementById(val)) {
              prop = val.toLowerCase().indexOf("css") == -1 ? "src" : "href";
              hashes[val] = document.getElementById(val)[prop];
            }
          });

          hashes = JSON.stringify(hashes);
          navigator.serviceWorker.register(`/sw.js`, { scope: "/" }).then(function(registration) {
            console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
          }, function(err) {
            console.log('ServiceWorker registration failed:', err);
          });
        });
      }
    </script>
